Source.Name: veracrypt
Source.Summary: Disk encryption software based on TrueCrypt
Source.Description: VeraCrypt is a software for establishing and maintaining an on-the-fly-encrypted volume (data storage device). No data stored on an encrypted volume can be read without using the correct encryption keys/files. Files can be copied to and from a mounted VeraCrypt volume just like they are copied to/from any normal disk.
